statements: SELECT * FROM vehicle_emissions WHERE vehicle_id = 1;
SELECT vehicle_type, emission_level FROM vehicle_emissions WHERE emission_level > 50;
SELECT vehicle_type, emission_level, date_recorded FROM vehicle_emissions WHERE vehicle_type = 'SUV' ORDER BY emission_level DESC;
SELECT * FROM vehicle_emissions WHERE date_recorded BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_count, MAX(emission_level) AS max_emission FROM vehicle_emissions;
SELECT * FROM vehicle_emissions WHERE vehicle_type = 'SUV' ORDER BY date_recorded DESC;
SELECT vehicle_id, vehicle_type, AVG(emission_level) AS average_emission FROM vehicle_emissions GROUP BY vehicle_type HAVING AVG(emission_level) > 5;
SELECT * FROM vehicle_emissions WHERE emission_level BETWEEN 5.0 AND 7.0;
SELECT * FROM vehicle_emissions ORDER BY emission_level ASC, date_recorded DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT DISTINCT vehicle_type, COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM vehicle_emissions GROUP BY vehicle_type;
SELECT * FROM VehicleEmissions WHERE emission_level > 0.05;
SELECT vehicle_type, emission_level FROM VehicleEmissions WHERE vehicle_id = 1;
SELECT MAX(emission_level) AS max_emission FROM VehicleEmissions;
SELECT trip_distance, trip_duration FROM TransportationData WHERE trip_id = 100;
SELECT vehicle_id, vehicle_type, emission_level FROM VehicleEmissions ORDER BY emission_level DESC;
SELECT * FROM VehicleEmissions WHERE emission_level > 2.5 ORDER BY vehicle_type DESC
SELECT vehicle_type, AVG(emission_level) AS avg_emission FROM VehicleEmissions GROUP BY vehicle_type HAVING AVG(emission_level) > 3.0 ORDER BY avg_emission
SELECT v.vehicle_type, t.trip_distance FROM VehicleEmissions v JOIN TransportationData t ON v.vehicle_id = t.vehicle_id WHERE t.trip_distance > 100 ORDER BY v.vehicle_type, t.trip_distance ASC
SELECT COUNT(vehicle_id) AS vehicle_count, SUM(emission_level) AS total_emission FROM VehicleEmissions WHERE emission_level < 2.0
SELECT vehicle_type, MAX(emission_level) AS max_emission FROM VehicleEmissions GROUP BY vehicle_type ORDER BY max_emission DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT * FROM Vehicle WHERE year = 2020;
SELECT id, model, brand FROM Vehicle ORDER BY brand DESC;
SELECT id, vehicle_id, emission_level FROM Emissions WHERE emission_level > 2.5;
SELECT * FROM EnvironmentImpact WHERE impact_type = 'Air Pollution';
SELECT id, location, emission_level_threshold FROM EnvironmentImpact ORDER BY emission_level_threshold DESC;
SELECT * FROM Vehicle WHERE year > 2010 ORDER BY brand DESC
SELECT model, brand FROM Vehicle WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT brand, model FROM Vehicle WHERE year = 2021 AND brand LIKE 'Toy%'
SELECT * FROM Emissions WHERE emission_level > 0.5 ORDER BY timestamp ASC
SELECT location, impact_type FROM EnvironmentImpact WHERE emission_level_threshold < 1.0
SELECT * FROM vehicle_emissions;
SELECT id, vehicle_type, model, emissions_level FROM vehicle_emissions WHERE year > 2015;
SELECT model, emissions_level FROM vehicle_emissions WHERE vehicle_type = 'SUV';
SELECT * FROM manufacturer WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT id, standard_name FROM emissions_standards;
SELECT * FROM manufacturer WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT model, year, emissions_level FROM vehicle_emissions WHERE emissions_level > 5.0 ORDER BY year DESC;

SELECT manufacturer.name, vehicle_emissions.model, emissions_standards.standard_name FROM manufacturer JOIN vehicle_emissions ON manufacturer.id = vehicle_emissions.id JOIN emissions_standards ON vehicle_emissions.emissions_level > 3.0;

SELECT manufacturer.name AS manufacturer_name, COUNT(*) AS total_models FROM manufacturer JOIN vehicle_emissions ON manufacturer.id = vehicle_emissions.id GROUP BY manufacturer.name HAVING total_models > 3;
SELECT manufacturer.country, COUNT(*) AS total_vehicles FROM manufacturer JOIN vehicle_emissions ON manufacturer.id = vehicle_emissions.id GROUP BY manufacturer.country ORDER BY total_vehicles DESC;
SELECT * FROM vehicle_info WHERE make = 'Toyota';
SELECT model, year FROM vehicle_info WHERE year > 2015;
SELECT make, emission_level FROM vehicle_info WHERE emission_level <= 5.0;
SELECT id, model, year FROM vehicle_info WHERE vehicle_type = 'SUV';
SELECT MAX(emission_rate), MIN(emission_rate) FROM emission_data;
SELECT * FROM vehicle_info WHERE year = 2020;
SELECT make, model, year FROM vehicle_info ORDER BY make ASC;
SELECT vi.make, vi.model, ed.emission_rate FROM vehicle_info vi JOIN emission_data ed ON vi.id = ed.vehicle_id;
SELECT vs.standard_name, COUNT(ed.data_id) AS total_emission_records FROM emissions_standards vs LEFT JOIN emission_data ed ON vs.standard_id = ed.emission_rate GROUP BY vs.standard_name;
SELECT vm.manufacturer_name, ld.city, ld.state, ld.country FROM vehicle_manufacturers vm JOIN location_data ld ON vm.manufacturer_id = ld.vehicle_id WHERE ld.country='USA';
